movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, Batman must confront one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Fargo
movies.plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, beginning with the five criminals who met in a police lineup.

movies.title: A Clockwork Orange
movies.plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

movies.title: Seven
movies.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: The Princess Bride
movies.plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies, and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

movies.title: The Wizard of Oz
movies.plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from her home in Kansas to the magical Land of Oz. She embarks on a journey to the Emerald City to meet the Wizard and find her way back home.

cast.character: The Wicked Witch of the West

oscars.bestOriginalSong: E.Y. Harburg, Harold Arlen (for 'Over the Rainbow')

movies.title: Amadeus
movies.plot: The life, success, and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporary composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent.

movies.title: The King's Speech
movies.plot: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

oscars.bestOriginalSong: My Heart Will Go On (Celine Dion)
oscars.bestFilmEditing: Conrad Buff IV, James Cameron, Richard A. Harris
oscars.bestSound: Gary Rydstrom, Tom Johnson, Gary Summers, Mark Ulano
oscars.bestMakeup: Tina Earnshaw, Greg Cannom, Simon Thompson
oscars.bestVisualEffects: Rob Legato, Mark A. Lasoff, Thomas L. Fisher, Michael Kanfer

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The life of a man with a low IQ who accomplished great things in his life despite his limitations.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines to subjugate humanity. He joins a group of rebels to fight against the machines.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.plot: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by a corrupt prince and forced into slavery. He rises as a gladiator to avenge his family and seek revenge.

oscars.bestVisualEffects: John Nelson, Neil Corbould, Tim Burke, Rob Harvey

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.plot: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy, experiencing the glamorous and violent lifestyle of the New York Mafia.

movies.title: Shaving Private Ryan
movies.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

oscars.bestSound: Gary Rydstrom, Gary Summers, Ronald Judkins

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who enters the subconscious of others to steal their secrets is offered a chance to redeem himself with a final job that involves planting an idea into someone's mind.

oscars.bestVisualEffects: Paul Franklin, Chris Corbould, Andrew Lockley, Peter Bebb

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.plot: Lion prince Simba grows up in the African savanna after his uncle Scar kills his father Mufasa. Simba returns as an adult to take back his homeland from Scar with the help of his friends.

oscars.bestOriginalSong: Can You Feel the Love Tonight (Elton John, Tim Rice)

movies.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.plot: After the rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader.

oscars.bestSound: Bill Varney, Steve Maslow, Gregg Landaker, Peter Sutton
oscars.bestArtDirection: Norman Reynolds, Leslie Dilley, Harry Lange
oscars.bestVisualEffects: Brian Johnson, Richard Edlund, Dennis Muren, Bruce Nicholson

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

oscars.bestVisualEffects: Dennis Muren, Stan Winston, Phil Tippett, Michael Lantieri
oscars.bestSound: Gary Summers, Gary Rydstrom, Shawn Murphy, Ron Judkins

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

movies.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
movies.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

oscars.bestVisualEffects: Carlo Rambaldi, Dennis Muren, Kenneth F. Smith

movies.title: The Shining
movies.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

oscars.bestArtDirection: Norman Reynolds, Leslie Dilley, Michael Ford
oscars.bestVisualEffects: Richard Edlund, Kit West, Bruce Nicholson, Joe Johnston

movies.title: Jaws
movies.plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach resort, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

oscars.bestSound: Robert L. Hoyt, Roger Heman Jr.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.plot: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend eccentric scientist Doc Brown. Marty encounters his young parents and must ensure they fall in love or risk altering the course of history.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.plot: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

movies.title: The Sixth Sense 2
movies.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: The Graduate
movies.plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

movies.title: The Breakfast Club
movies.plot: Five high school students with nothing in common spend a Saturday detention together in their high school library.

movies.title: The Sound of Music
movies.plot: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.plot: A hotel concierge and his lobby boy become involved in a murder mystery at the Grand Budapest Hotel.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theater owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.title: The Exorcist
movies.plot: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer HAL 9000.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.plot: During World War II, Rick Blaine, a cynical nightclub owner in Casablanca, Morocco, becomes entangled with his former lover Ilsa Lund and her husband, Victor Laszlo, a resistance leader. As Rick's past and his feelings for Ilsa resurface, he must make a difficult decision that will impact their lives and the war effort.

oscars.bestAdaptedScreenplay: Julius J. Epstein, Philip G. Epstein, Howard Koch

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.plot: Randle P. McMurphy, a troublemaking criminal, feigns insanity to avoid a prison sentence and ends up in a mental hospital. He soon clashes with the authoritarian Nurse Ratched, and his rebellious nature inspires the other patients to challenge her authority.

oscars.bestPicture: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.plot: Set in the 1930s, a gentle giant named John Coffey is accused of murdering two young girls. A corrections officer, Paul Edgecomb, discovers that there is more to John than meets the eye. As events unfold, Paul begins to question John's guilt and realizes that he possesses mysterious healing powers.

oscars.bestSound: Robert J. Litt, Elliot Tyson, Michael Herbick, Willie D. Burton

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.plot: Llewelyn Moss stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong in the desert and takes a briefcase full of money. This sets off a violent chain of events involving a relentless hitman named Anton Chigurh and a local sheriff, Ed Tom Bell, who is trying to maintain order in a world gone mad.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young FBI trainee, Clarice Starling, seeks the help of the brilliant yet insane serial killer, Dr. Hannibal Lecter, to catch another serial killer known as Buffalo Bill. The two form an uneasy alliance as they work to solve the case.

movies.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
movies.plot: Blanche DuBois, a troubled woman with a mysterious past, moves in with her sister Stella and her husband Stanley Kowalski in New Orleans. As Blanche and Stanley's personalities clash, tensions rise, leading to a dramatic and tragic conflict.
